title: LawBridge – Legal Document Simplifier
goal: Convert contracts, terms, and bills into easy summaries with structured key points.
why_it_matters: Legal documents are dense and inaccessible to non-lawyers; this tool simplifies them into everyday language.
data: Sample policy texts, PDFs, open legal datasets (GovInfo, Justice.gov).
ai: Summarization with fine-tuned BART-small or rule templates.
outcome: Clear use of NLP for accessibility and ethics-driven design.
